Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Artificial intelligence is always available, it is not limited in time. You can formulate the question many times in different ways to get some issues about my work. Communication with teachers is limited in time, but they give more accurate and fruitful feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from a person is always perceived more personally, so the reaction is usually stronger.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The teacher can take into account non-verbal information, long-term context of interaction, etc., which does not GenAI.
